response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a symbol of innovation, quality, and functionality. We believe its value exceeds $8,000, reflecting its unique features and the dedication of our team behind it. Considering its exceptional qualities, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an opportunity to own a piece that combines luxury with practicality, tailored to exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
